name: PUNCHERMAN! Open Beta
description:
PUNCHERMAN!

Punching is all you know. You've punched zombies, demons, and aliens -- but now you face your greatest challenge yet: fatherhood.

A week in the life of a former violent FPS protagonist/superhero/generally manly man trying to prove himself as a good father and husband. Engage in the most masculine of stay-at-home-daddery by completing household chores and running errands using only your incredible punch -- or just punch and destroy everything you see.

PUNCHERMAN! needs you!

The friendly folks here at FISTICUFFS! Studios have opened up our 12-week game development project, PUNCHERMAN!, for an informal open beta... and we want to hear from you! Give our game a play and feel free to give us some feedback through this form:

https://forms.gle/FBHzG6NpuADLpWfY7

We are eager to finish this game strongly -- and feedback is an integral part of making sure that happens!

Like the game?

Give us a follow on Twitter (@PUNCHERMAN_GAME; https://twitter.com/PUNCHERMAN_GAME) to keep up-to-date with any important updates as we wrap up the game and publish it more officially!
